column5: I'm heading to Pigeon Lake next weekend -- I was there for a week in the summer and had trouble getting onto any walleye and/or crappie?  Last year we did well around a couple of the green markers, this year nada.  I'd be glad for some advice?  Managed to move a few Muskie around, and the bass saved our trip...but I'd be glad for some walleye/crappie next weekend.  Thanks for your help. Kevin
